showerReviews.reviewText: Stopping to shower and let our dog out. Travelling to inlaws and tired AF. So far it's been a good experience, very convenient!

… It would be better if you dude took care of cleaning showers - you would be more useful!  On top of that the two shower doors were locked and you didn't even have the keys to open them!  A queue gathered and the lady who cleans did not even …
Shower was perfectly good. …

Not a bad place.
Shower dude...did a great job.
Cashier had  bad attitude.
8-(

Way to small of a parking lot. Shower rooms were moldy and hot. Actual dirt on the walls. Service was typically very slow. Store was dirty. Fire exit completely blocked with trash. Apparently very lazy staff.

Shower 1
there is no hot water in the shower (the water is slightly warmer than outside) I am freezing in this room.
People get lazy, I know how doing showers especially when busy when the truckers come in but stay  on top of it/take pride in your jobs. Being a driver it’s not easy and it wears you down. …
Rude and snarky staff, unattended restrooms, the shower cleaning staff can't get the right towels in, park where ever you wish. This place could really use an overhaul on customer service.

… I couldn't get extra towels and rags for my shower. Mind you when I went back to take my shower no one was there I look for someone, but in the midst of looking for someone I come across the laundry room towers and rags stacked up no washer …

All spots are reserved parking basically & you must get there before 3-4pm to get one. Little to no parking for non reserved spots bc ppl park there small egg sedan cars in those spaces. Shower pressure weak but gets the job done!

showerReviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this place the work there are very friendly they don't mind helping the homeless out with a shower environment is very clean bathrooms excellent clean showers are perfect even the owner of the PFC. …

A truck stop! With a fresh salad bar!  These people are doing it right.   Wish other truck stops will take note

Update-  had to change my review.     Went in.  Paid 15 dollar for a shower. For a shower that was not clean.
Clean shower. No warm food on Sunday. Decent amount of parking if you can get in a space that's not reserved. Diesel prices are the same as every other truck stop in the area.

… because I wanted those ribs! Put in debit card and asked for Frequent customer card. Went in for said card and told "we don't have those yet". So I said, how can I get my shower rewards? She said " we have no shower program, that's $12". …

I really like this place to put diesel, eat, shower everything is very good.
